name: Chicken Hurry
author: MOM2112
summary: This is a quick and easy dish to make. Great for potlucks, family dinners, or cold the next day with salad for a picnic. This sauce is also great on pork spare ribs. Serve hot with rice and salad.
ingredients: 1 (3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place chicken pieces in a single layer in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish
In a medium bowl, combine the ketchup, water, brown sugar and dry soup mix
Carefully pour over the chicken, making sure that all of the pieces are covered
Cover dish and bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour
